description: purple-brown; circular shape; top surface flat, slopes down towards front; key pad on top surface; grey number buttons; rounded hand-set sits behind key pad; hang-up lever under mouth piece
text: Northern Telecom produced a variety of modernistic phone casings such as the "Contempra" wall phone and this stylish model.  Sleek lines and deep, intense colors were common to their designs.  A series of round or spherical phones ("Genie," "Dawn," and "Pancake" models) in the '80s were a popular alternative to the earlier box-like forms.
title: Push-button desk phone
